ESCR.expressao:
Dim dt As DataTable = cdata.getdatatable("select u_thankustamp stamp, tipo, mensagem, deutil, nomeutil deUtil, paraUtil, parauserno, ousrdata, ousrhora, edNum, likes from u_thanku (nolock) where deutil <> 0 and mensagem is not null")
Dim tmensagem as String
Dim tstamp as String
Dim tipo as String
Dim edNum as Double
Dim tLikes as Double
Dim deUtil as String
dim paraUtil as String
Dim results As New List(Of Object)()

Dim dtThanks As DataTable = PhcCommandBuilder.CreateSelect("u_thankustamp as stamp, tipo, mensagem, deutil, nomeutil nomeUtil, paraUtil, parauserno, ousrdata, ousrhora, edNum, likes").From("u_thanku", usenoLockPara:=True).Where("deutil <> 0 and mensagem is not null").GetDataTable

If dtThanks.Rows.Count > 0 Then
  For Each row As DataRow In dtThanks.Rows
    deUtil = row("nomeUtil").ToString()
    paraUtil = row("paraUtil").ToString()
    tipo = row("tipo").ToString()
    edNum = Convert.ToDouble(row("edNum"))
    tstamp = row("stamp").ToString()
    tmensagem = row("mensagem").ToString()
    tLikes = Convert.ToDouble(row("likes"))

    Dim record = New With {
      .deUtil = deUtil,
      .paraUtil = paraUtil,
      .tipo = tipo,
      .edNum = edNum,
      .stamp = tstamp,
      .mensagem = tmensagem,
      .likes = tLikes
      }

    results.Add(record)
  Next
End If


Dim jsonResult As String = JsonConvert.SerializeObject(results)

' Construct the JSON response
HttpContext.Current.Response.Clear()
HttpContext.Current.Response.ContentType = "application/json; charset=utf-8"
HttpContext.Current.Response.Write(jsonResult)
HttpContext.Current.Response.End()
